channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for RTV SLO, 10–12 December 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 2–3 seats
  • Lista Marjana Šarca (RE): 3–4 seats
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 1–2 seats
  • Stranka modernega centra (RE): 0 seats
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 0–1 seats
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek (RE): 0 seats
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije (RE): 0 seats
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (NI): 0 seats
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 0 seats

item.description: TBD

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for RTV SLO, 10–12 December 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 21.2–27.6%
  • Lista Marjana Šarca (RE): 26.3–33.1%
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 11.8–16.9%
  • Stranka modernega centra (RE): 0.1–1.0%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 7.6–12.0%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 6.0–9.9%
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek (RE): 0.5–2.1%
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije (RE): 3.3–6.4%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (NI): 2.4–5.2%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 2.9–5.9%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for POP TV, 1–26 November 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 22.1–28.4%

  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 13.0–18.2%

  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije (RE): 1.6–3.9%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (NI): 4.4–7.8%
